heading: HR00427
0: A RESOLUTION COMMENDING CARLOS YULO AS THE FIRST SOUTHEAST ASIAN MALE GOLD MEDALIST IN WORLD ARTISTIC GYMNASTIC CHAMPIONSHIP HELD IN STUTTGART, GERMANY
status: Measure approved by the Committee on 2019-12-17
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00427
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION COMMENDING CARLOS YULO AS THE FIRST SOUTHEAST ASIAN MALE GOLD MEDALIST IN WORLD ARTISTIC GYMNASTIC CHAMPIONSHIP HELD IN STUTTGART, GERMANY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.
DATE FILED : 2019-10-14
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-12-17
          -The body approved the consolidation of HR Nos. 27, 429, 432, 435, 437, 445, 451, 461, 466, 478, 498, and 515
          -Consideration and Adoption of Measures on HR Nos. 427, 429, 432, 435, 437, 445, 451, 461, 466, 478, 498, and 515 (commending Carlos Edriel Yulo for winning the gold medal in the 49th Federation Internationale De Gymnastique World Artistic Championship
      2. Measure approved by the Committee on 2019-12-17
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT ON 2019-11-04
